original_text: and lusted after her lovers there, whose members were like those of donkeys, and whose issue was like that of horses.
korean_text: 그의 하체는 나귀 같고 그의 정수는 말 같은 음란한 간부를 사랑하였도다

sentences.original_text: and lusted after her lovers there
whose members were like those of donkeys
and whose issue was like that of horses
